channel.title: Pi 317 command
channel.description:
pi source 317
how do i make a command that does like an emote/animation thing. so like ::emote 545 and i can see what animation that is so i can make my prayer do that animation when clicked.

item.title: Pi 317 command
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

[quote=“dogs, post:3, topic:375042”]if (command.startsWith(“emote”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
if (emote < 8000 && emote > 0) {
pEmote = emote;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sM(“Bad emote ID”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Bad emote ID”);
}
}[/quote]

Your delta command is not needed. He asked for a Project Insanity command.

Kind of back on topic:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:2, topic:375042”]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“anim”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
c.startAnimation(Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}[/quote]

This one will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi 317 command
item.dc:creator: @dogs dogs
item.description:
@dogs wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“emote”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
if (emote < 8000 && emote > 0) {
pEmote = emote;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sM(“Bad emote ID”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Bad emote ID”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("anim")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			c.startAnimation(Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
			c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		}
